stage_identity.evidence: Byte displays teen stage characteristics: gangly proportions, awkward but energetic posture, larger form than baby stage. Silhouette matches expected teen morphology with elongated limbs and expressive facial features.

Desk: 1 wooden desk center stage with 1 oversized silver laptop. Food bowl: 1 bowl on floor to right of desk. All single-instance props maintained as single instances.
